name: Business Block Widget
author: grandslambert

sections.description:
Create widgets to display business contact information. This is not a contact manager as business information is stored in each widget.

  • Business name and address
  • Up to three business phone numbers
  • Link to business web site and contact form or email address
sections.installation:
1. Upload business-block-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the default settings on the settings panel.
  4. Add widgets to your sidebar.
sections.changelog:
1.4 – Feruary 10th, 2011

  • Fixed the readme file to have the correct information
  • Updated all files to fix some security issues.
  • Renamed two functions to allow plugin to work on PHP4 servers.
  • Cleaned up code to increase speed.

1.3 – May 12th, 2010

  • Fixed a bug where the two-column template used the wrong text on the web site and email texts.

1.2 – May 12th, 2010

  • Added support for language translation.
  • Changed links and fixed some code issues.
  • Change the name of the main file to business-block-widget.php to work with languages.
  • WARNING: This upgrade may not automatically re-activate the plugin. You may need to do this manually due to the main file name change.

1.1 – December 18th, 2009

  • Updated the default templates to fix a bug where link and email were not showing.

1.0 – December 18th, 2009

  • Officially released from Beta
  • Cleaned up and optimized a lot of code
  • Fixed a bug where widget defaults were not used on new widgets.
  • Fixed a bug to allow WordPress MU Support.

0.5 – October 26th, 2009

  • First release

description:
Create widgets to display business contact information. This is not a contact manager as business information is stored in each widget.

  • Business name and address
  • Up to three business phone numbers
  • Link to business web site and contact form or email address

upgrade_notice.1.4: Fixed some formatting issues, not vital but recommended.
upgrade_notice.1.2: No need to upgrade except to keep current or translate the plugin.
upgrade_notice.1.1: Upgrade if you display links or emails in your widget.
